item.title: ServiceNow open sources Fast-LLM in a bid to help enterprises train AI models 20% quicker
item.description: ServiceNow open sources AI training breakthrough with Fast-LLM framework promising lower risk, higher experimentation.

item.title: Lam Research launches collaborative robots to optimize critical maintenance in chip factories
item.description: Lam Research introduced Dextro, the chip industry’s first collaborative robot designed to optimize maintenance in chip factories.

item.title: Solos launches AirGo Vision — ChatGPT-enabled AI smart glasses with a camera
item.description: Solos announced that is launching AirGo Vision, the first smart glasses with ChatGPT-enabled AI and a camera.

item.title: Defending SOCs Under Siege: Battling Adversarial AI Attacks
item.description: With 77% of enterprises victimized by adversarial AI, the question isn't if your Security Operations Center (SOC) will be targeted—it's when.

item.title: OpenAI releases hyperrealistic AI video generator Sora Turbo to the public
item.description: With hyperrealistic AI video generator Sora, OpenAI includes guardrails against generating likenesses of real people, violence and more.
